posts.post_content:
Have these scrapbook removals available for sale or trade. Would be looking to get T206’s or E90’s in trade. Add $3 for bubble mailer regardless of how many you buy or I can ship via a PWE st these prices.

I’m not overly familiar with T207’s so please look at the scans for judgement. If prices are off and you’re interested, shoot me an offer. Shoot me a PM if you want a closer scan or to make an offer.
